articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Josh Neuroth
The best way to get a job in #web3 is to start contributing in a DAO! 
@kayprasla shares in her blog her journey from web2 ➡️ web3 via @developer_dao 
Welcome to @ankr!
krinza.eth (🧱, 🚀): 🎉 career update: 
last month I left my web2 job @afiniti to dive into Web3, & today I'm so insanely excited to be joining the product team at @ankr as a dev advocate🥑
beyond excited to be teaming up w/ @joshneuroth, @JoshCStein & 👀
 https://bit.ly/datatodevrel

articles.description:
RT Patrick Collins
🛡 How to get prices securely in web3
🧵A thread
We've seen way too many hacks with this DeFi 101 issue. Please spread this message.
1. Don't ever use low liquidity tokens
2. Use a decentralized oracle like @chainlink 
3. TWAPs are scary AF
And the most important one... 👇

articles.description:
